snippet: Organizational problems have plagued the current Grand Prix series, but Fabiano Caruana is holding the lead as expected.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that organizational problems have plagued Grand Prix series, but Fabiano Caruana is holding the lead as expected.
lead_paragraph: Organizational problems have plagued the current Grand Prix series, but Fabiano Caruana is holding the lead as expected.

headline.print_headline: After Rocky Start, Grand Prix Finds a Favorite in the Lead
